mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Notifications ( RECEIVER_ID, SENDER_ID, TYPE, MESSAGE ) VALUES ( #{receiverId}, #{senderId}, #{type}, #{message} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, RECEIVER_ID, SENDER_ID, TYPE, MESSAGE, IS_READ, CREATED_AT FROM Notifications WHERE RECEIVER_ID = #{receiverId} AND IS_READ != 1 ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
